document_data.name: Chalaratha's Fragrances
document_data.mainbody: '''Chalaratha's Fragrances''' was a perfume shop and factory located in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned and operated by the skilled [[wizard]] [[Chalaratha]].
document_data.Location: Chalaratha's Fragrances was found in the southwest section of the city on [[South Ssemm Spur]].
